slots.name: onecx-column-group-selection
slots.description: Slot used by library components that can be used in all applications. Its defined in shell and should not be redefined in products that use the slots. Use this slot to manage table column group selection via assigned remote components.

slots.name: onecx-search-config
slots.description: Slot used by library components that can be used in all applications. Its defined in shell and should not be redefined in products that use the slots. Use this slot to manage search configurations on the search pages via assigned remote components.

slots.name: onecx-shell-footer
slots.description: Footer area on the page e.g. logo, footer menu, version info etc.

slots.name: onecx-shell-header-left
slots.description: Shell header left region

slots.name: onecx-shell-header-right
slots.description: Shell header right region e.g. horizontal menu, top bar

slots.name: onecx-shell-horizontal-menu
slots.description: Shell horizontal menu within shell header right

slots.name: onecx-shell-sub-header
slots.description: Shell sub header region e.g. banner bar

slots.name: onecx-shell-vertical-menu
slots.description: Shell vertical menu

slots.name: onecx-shell-header.start
slots.description: Start region of the shell header (e.g. logo)

slots.name: onecx-shell-header.center
slots.description: Center region of the shell header (e.g. horizontal menu, search bar)

slots.name: onecx-shell-header.end
slots.description: End region of the shell header (e.g. user profile)

slots.name: onecx-shell-sub-header.start
slots.description: Start region of the shell sub header (e.g. bookmarks)

slots.name: onecx-shell-sub-header.center
slots.description: Center region of the shell sub header (e.g. action buttons)

slots.name: onecx-shell-sub-header.end
slots.description: End region of the shell sub header (e.g. action buttons)

slots.name: onecx-shell-body-start.start
slots.description: Start region of the shell body start (e.g. quick links)

slots.name: onecx-shell-body-start.center
slots.description: Center region of the shell body start (e.g. sidebar navigation)

slots.name: onecx-shell-body-start.end
slots.description: End region of the shell body start (e.g. action buttons)

slots.name: onecx-shell-body-header.start
slots.description: Start region of the shell body header (e.g. breadcrumbs)

slots.name: onecx-shell-body-header.center
slots.description: Center region of the shell body header (e.g. title)

slots.name: onecx-shell-body-header.end
slots.description: End region of the shell body header (e.g. action buttons)

slots.name: onecx-shell-body-end.start
slots.description: Start region of the shell body end (e.g. quick links)

slots.name: onecx-shell-body-end.center
slots.description: Center region of the shell body end (e.g. sidebar navigation)

slots.name: onecx-shell-body-end.end
slots.description: End region of the shell body end (e.g. action buttons)

slots.name: onecx-shell-body-footer.start
slots.description: Start region of the shell body footer (e.g. info)

slots.name: onecx-shell-body-footer.center
slots.description: Center region of the shell body footer (e.g. comment section)

slots.name: onecx-shell-body-footer.end
slots.description: End region of the shell body footer (e.g. action buttons)

slots.name: onecx-shell-footer.start
slots.description: Start region of the shell footer (e.g. logo)

slots.name: onecx-shell-footer.center
slots.description: Center region of the shell footer (e.g. footer menu)

slots.name: onecx-shell-footer.end
slots.description: End region of the shell footer (e.g. version info)

slots.name: onecx-shell-extensions
slots.description: For providing additional functions, that will not be displayed inside the slot (e.g. toast messages, cookie banner)
